John Tero is the vice president of engineering at Greenvity and is responsible for leading the companyâ€™s R&D and product development. John has more than 35 years of experience in analog and RF design in CMOS, BiCMOS and bipolar technologies. He is an industry expert in RF and mixed-signal design for UWB, WLAN, CDMA, AMPS, ETACS and radars.

Before joining Greenvity, John was the senior director of engineering at Sigma Designs where he led an engineering team in the development of RF and mixed-signal designs for wireless, powerline and cable connectivity products. Prior to Sigma Designs being acquired, John was the vice president of RF engineering at Blue7 Communications and led development of ultra-wideband wireless RF chips. Johnâ€™s extensive experience in engineering and product management includes serving as president and CEO of RF and mixed-signal company SemiCom, and positions at TelCom, Philips, Precision Monolithics, Ferranti and Plessey.
